industries: Capital Markets, Banking, and International Trade and Development
description:
About the job





Database Developer / Data Engineer (DB2) with Python, Linux, Unix, SQL.




Here at mthree, we pair talented graduates with leading global businesses. We’re always on the lookout for ambitious graduates to join the mthree Alumni Graduate Program, kick-starting your tech career within an entry-level Software Developer role and working onsite with a leading fintech organization in Montreal, Quebec.




Our 24-month graduate program begins with 4-8 weeks of paid training and career coaching, where you’ll learn everything you need to hit the ground running as a software developer.




After you've completed the paid training, you'll have the opportunity to fast-track your career at a global investment bank or leading tech company.





What you’ll do:


If successful, you’ll work with a leading Investment Bank, located in Montreal, as a software developer, designing, developing and maintaining complex applications in a global team environment.





Introduction:


This is a data Engineer/DB2 developer role in the team responsible for developing on the firm's Trade Capture data stores that holds the transactional bigdata for real time and archive processing and getting it into the archives and data lake.




The global team consists of highly technical team members who are adaptable to both hands on development and project management. We deliver multiple projects for multiple business areas in parallel. The business owners and subject matter experts will be globally distributed, making communication and pro-active to be important. You will be expected to work closely with our operations partners on requirements for projects.




The development will be performed using an agile methodology which is based on scrum (time boxing, daily scrum meetings, retrospectives, etc.) and XP (continuous integration, refactoring, unit testing, etc.) best practices. Candidates must therefore be able to work collaboratively, demonstrate good ownership and be able to work well in teams.





Primary responsibilities include:



Translate business requirement into queries against a set of relational tables and produce reporting based on the requirements.

Design and build reporting layer from different data sources and act as a SPOC for user queries

Database and ETL development, including stored procedures, queries, performance tuning etc., using python, SQL and ETL tools such as Informatica.

Efficient and clean automation script (using Python etc.) as part of the ETL process.

The current global team members are all very skilled in domain modeling, database design, big data, Java and messaging so this is an excellent opportunity to play a key role in the growing team.






Technical Skills Requirement



Strong relational database skills especially with DB2/Sybase or/and Greenplum.

Knowledge of Hadoop/Spark is desirable.

Create high quality and optimized stored procedures and queries

Experience with Power Designer or some similar modeling tool.

Strong with scripting language such as Python and Unix / K-Shell

Strong knowledge base of relational database performance and tuning such as: proper use of indices, database statistics/reorgs, de-normalization concepts.

Experience with data mining is a big plus

Familiar with lifecycle of a trade and flows of data in an investment banking operation.

Experienced in Agile development process






What you need:



Bachelor of Science in Computer Science

OOP development experience

Solid software engineering principles (data structures, OO, design patterns, multithreading)

Good trouble shooting and debugging skills

Working knowledge of database concepts (SQL, stored procs, schema design)

Understanding of the formal software development lifecycle (SDLC)

Understanding of test-driven development






What you’ll receive:



Fully paid, in-depth and interactive training with a diverse group of like-minded graduates, delivered by experts with working knowledge of the field.

A competitive graduate salary

Pay increases every 6 months

A flexible benefits package including gym membership

Ongoing training and pastoral care

Invaluable industry experience and the opportunity to start a career in a desirable and competitive industry






DIVERSITY:



We take great pride in celebrating the diversity of each and every individual who contributes to making mthree the company it is today and will be in the future. We value diversity both within mthree and with our partner companies, and we’re proud to provide an environment where all our colleagues can flourish by promoting a strong culture of equality but most importantly, inclusion. We never want people to change - only add to the amazing mix of people that work for mthree.

Python Database developer 
Canada 
12+ Months 

Mandatory Skills: 
Python + Database (SQL and Snowflake)

Good to Have:
Experience working in Unix environment

JD:
•	8+ years of experience of developing large-scale web application 
•	Excellent knowledge building web application and automation tools using Python and open source tools and technologies 
Python 3.x, Django, Flask
•	5+ years developing server-side RESTful web applications
•	Strong database experience: Oracle, SQL, Snowflake
•	Experience working in DevOps model – continuous integration environment using tools such as Git, Jenkins, SonarQube
•	2+ years of experience operating in an agile environment
•	Experience working in Unix environment

job_title: Indoor Connectivity Solutions Engineer | Ingénieur(e) en solutions de connectivité d'intérieur
industries: Internet Publishing
description:
Meta Connectivity is constantly iterating to solve problems, co-develop solutions and deploy networks through direct engagement with the global telecoms industry, including network operators, network equipment vendors and communities such as the Telecom Infra Project (TIP). We are looking for a practical, system thinker and technical expert who respectfully questions the status quo to discover and implement high impact solutions. If you have passion for networks and want to work with network operators, industry partners, and internal teams to drive innovative, cost efficient solutions that accelerate the scaled deployment of a faster internet – then this is a great role for you.As an Indoor Wi-Fi Solutions Engineer, you will engage with Meta Connectivity engineering and product teammates as well as TIP OpenWiFi community members to design, develop, trial and deploy Wi-Fi solutions. In parallel, you will interface with industry leading partners including hardware/software vendors and system solution providers. Finally, you will work closely with network operators technical teams to understand how Meta and its partner’s contributions can be of most impact for indoor connectivity.-------Meta Connectivity fait sans cesse des itérations pour résoudre des problèmes, codévelopper des solutions et déployer des réseaux en collaboration directe avec l'industrie mondiale des télécommunications, y compris les opérateurs de réseaux, les vendeurs d'équipement et des communautés telles que Telecom Infra Project (TIP). Nous recherchons une personne à l'esprit pratique et à la pensée systémique, qui questionne le statu quo avec respect afin de découvrir et mettre en pratique des solutions à grande portée. Si vous êtes passionné(e) pour les réseaux et que vous voulez travailler avec des opérateurs de réseaux, des partenaires de l'industrie et des équipes à l'interne pour produire des solutions novatrices, rentables et efficaces qui permettront d'accélerer le déploiement à grande échelle d'un réseau internet plus rapide, alors ceci est un rôle parfait pour vous.En tant qu'ingénieur(e) wifi d'intérieur, vous collaborerez avec vos équipiers à l'ingénierie et aux produits chez Meta Connectivity ainsi qu'avec des membres de la communauté TIP OpenWiFi pour concevoir, développer, mettre à l'essai et déployer des solutions wifi. Parallèlement, vous communiquerez avec des partenaires éminents au sein de l'industrie, dont des vendeurs de produits matériels/logiciels et des fournisseurs de solutions système. Finalement, vous travaillerez de près avec les équipes techniques d'opérateurs de réseaux pour comprendre comment les contributions de Meta et de ses partenaires peuvent produire le plus grand impact pour la connectivité d'intérieur.

Indoor Connectivity Solutions Engineer | Ingénieur(e) en solutions de connectivité d'intérieur Responsibilities:



Develop use cases & requirements, architect, design, develop, and test solutions working closely with network operators, SaaS cloud providers, ODM hardware providers, application vendors (ISVs), system integrators (SIs), as well as internal engineering, product, and cross-functional teams. | Développer des cas d'utilisation et des exigences, faire l'architecture, la conception, le développement et le test de solutions en collaboration étroite avec des opérateurs de réseaux, des fournisseurs infonuagiques SaaS, des fournisseurs de matériel ODM, des éditeurs de logiciels indépendants (ELI), des intégrateurs de systèmes (IS), ainsi qu'avec des équipes d'ingénierie, de produits et multi-disciplinaires à l'interne.

Support the Community Development of Open Indoor Systems that enable network operators to quickly adopt innovative, lowest total cost of ownership approaches for indoor connectivity. | Soutenir le Développement communautaire de systèmes d'intérieur ouverts, qui permet aux opérateurs de réseaux d'adopter rapidement des approches novatrices et à faible coût pour la connectivité d'intérieur.

Work closely with and support network operators and infrastructure providers to plan and execute deployment projects from lab/field/market trials to scale deployments. | Travailler de près et soutenir les opérateurs de réseaux et les fournisseurs d'infrastructure pour la planification et l'exécution de projets de déploiment, depuis les essais en labo/sur le terrain/sur le marché jusqu'au déploiment à grande échelle.

Strong communication, interpersonal, and collaboration experience with both external partners (technical & non-technical) and internal cross-functional teams. | Solide expérience en communication, en relations interpersonnelles et en collaboration, autant avec des partenaires à l'externe (techniques et non techniques) qu'avec des équipes multi-disciplinaires à l'interne.

Willingness to work within partner - vendor facilities, able to travel up to 10% time, and/or cross-time zone calls. | Volonté de travailler sur des sites appartenant à des partenaires/vendeurs, capacité à voyager jusqu'à 10 % du temps et/ou à effectuer des appels hors de son fuseau horaire.



Minimum Qualifications:



Experience working across technical domains and organizations to identify, describe and define end-to-end solutions and approaches | Expérience de travail multidisciplinaire et avec plusieurs organisations pour identifier, décrire et définir des solutions et des approches intégrées.

Experience with network centric software architecture, data model, and API design & implementation | Expérience avec l'architecture logicielle, la modélisation de données et la conception d'API réseaucentriques.

Experience with Linux Foundation (LF) Networking/network operating systems | Expérience avec les systèmes d'exploitation et de réseautage de la Fondation Linux (FL).

Experience in one or more scripting languages such as Python, Bash, etc., and debugging scripting issues | Expérience avec un ou plusieurs langages de script, tels que Python, Bash, etc., ainsi qu'avec le débogage de problèmes de scriptage.

Experience with micro-services architectures for network management and automation systems | De l'expérience dans le domaine des architectures micro-services pour les systèmes de gestion et d'automatisation des réseaux.

Knowledge of core network, Access Network design and Edge Computing/Function Virtualization | Connaissance du réseau central, de la conception du réseau d'accès et de l'informatique de périphérie/de la virtualisation des fonctions.

Experience with operator back office OSS systems including Inventory, Assurance and Service Activation | De l'expérience dans les systèmes OSS de service d'appui des opérateurs, notamment l'inventaire, l'assurance et l'activation des services.

Experience with release engineering, CI/CD tools, DevOps tools (Ansible, Jenkins, Docker, etc.), and automated testing of network software | Expérience avec l'ingénierie de mise en production, les outils CI/CD, les outils DevOps (Ansible, Jenkins, Docker, etc.) et le test de logiciels réseau automatisé.

Firm understanding of mobile and in-building wireless network infrastructure and architectures | Connaissance approfondie de l'infrastructure et des architectures des réseaux sans fil mobiles et internes aux bâtiments.

Familiarity with the evolution and recent development of cellular and Wi-Fi wireless networking | Familiarité avec l'évolution et le développement récent des réseaux sans fil cellulaires et Wi-Fi

Experience with Wi-Fi back office systems including captive portals, network assist, authentication and redirection | Expérience avec les systèmes wifi administratifs, incluant les portails captifs, l'aide au réseautage, l'authentification et la redirection

Experience understanding and describing network management and automation solutions for multiple deployment and operations scenarios including in-building/outdoor uses cases, fixed/mobile access, enterprise/public access | De l'expérience dans la compréhension et la description des solutions de gestion et d'automatisation des réseaux pour de multiples scénarios de déploiement et d'exploitation, y compris les cas d'utilisation à l'intérieur et à l'extérieur des bâtiments, l'accès fixe/mobile, l'accès aux entreprises et au public.

Communication skills including experience talking to both technical and business audiences. Knowledge to collaborate with both external partners and internal cross-functional teams | Habiletés en communication, incluant de l'expérience avec des auditoires provenant des milieux techniques et des affaires. Connaissances permettant de collaborer avec des partenaires externes ainsi qu'avec des équipes multidisciplinaires à l'interne.

Understanding of business-related aspects of a solution, and proven to interact with business teams on technical & economic aspects of a solution | Compréhension des aspects commerciaux d'une solution, et preuve d'expérience en interaction avec des équipes en milieu d'affaires sur les aspects techniques et économiques d'une solution.

Currently has, or is in the process of obtaining a Bachelor's degree in Computer Science, Computer Engineering, relevant technical field, or equivalent practical experience. Degree must be completed prior to joining Meta. | Possède, ou est en train d'obtenir une licence en informatique, en génie informatique, dans un domaine technique pertinent, ou une expérience pratique équivalente. Le diplôme doit être obtenu avant de rejoindre Meta.



Preferred Qualifications:

industries: IT Services and IT Consulting
description:
Role and Responsibilities




Expert in Python, with knowledge of at least one Python web framework such as Flask, Django etc.

Familiarity with some ORM (Object Relational Mapper) libraries

Able to integrate multiple data sources and databases into one system

Understanding of the threading limitations of Python, and multi-process architecture

Good understanding of server-side templating languages

Working knowledge of front-end technologies, such as JavaScript, HTML5, and CSS3

Basic understanding of front-end technology Angular JS

Understanding of accessibility and security compliance


Knowledge of user authentication and authorization between multiple systems, servers, and environments



Understanding of fundamental design principles behind a scalable application


Familiarity with event-driven programming in Python

Strong unit test and debugging skills

Proficient understanding of code versioning tools such as GIT, SVN, perforce etc.

Familiarity with Agile processes like scrum and Kanban.

Strong database knowledge on any database like Sybase, Oracle etc.

Experience with NOSQL Databases like MongoDB, Elastic Search.

Able to create database schemas that represent and support business processes




MUST HAVE




Expert in Python (More than 6+ years of experience), with knowledge of at least one Python web framework such as Flask, Django etc.

Candidate should have experience using tooling related to code management, requirements management, and release management.

Candidate should have a thorough understanding of SDLC processes for agile development, testing and release. Ideal candidate should have experience with DevOps, CI/CD (continuous integration, continuous delivery) and Jira.

Experience with NoSQL Databases like MongoDB, Elasticsearch and RDBMS databases like Sybase, Oracle etc.

Good Understanding on REST micro-service style architecture.




NICE TO HAVE




Experience in front-end technology Angular JS, React JS is a plus

Development Team leading skills.

Knowledge in Java/J2EE

industries: IT Services and IT Consulting
description:
Business Analyst (6 Month Contract)


Mississauga, ON (Remote)





You will be responsible for:



Requirements gathering

Gap analysis

Ensuring stakeholders, partners, support team is on the same page, what is expected, delivery timeline. Being aware of the business contacts, the rationale, and metrics.

Working with business partners, technology partners, the vendor, and the stakeholder

Validating that work pieces are completed






What we’re looking for:



4-7 years of Business Analysis experience, or experience in a similar role

Strong verbal and written communication

Experience identifying, addressing and working with partners to uncover any and all gaps

Development validation experience

Strong documentation Skills

Experience with Confluence and Jira

Strong analytical skills

About the job


We are looking for experienced front-end, back-end and full-stack developers and software engineers to develop high-quality testable and scalable applications. The ideal candidate will be adaptable and able to work with several complex issues at the same time (makes the working day interesting). This position will also involve software performance improvement, testing, deployment, as well as development of APIs and integrations.  





Tasks and responsibilities:



Develop QualiWare based solutions, quality software and web application products related to business management (Enterprise Architecture, process management, application, risk, goals and KPIs, quality and compliance management, and auditing)

Identify business needs and discover potential opportunities for improvement of existing solutions. Analyze and maintain existing software applications

Translate business needs into both functional and technical solution descriptions

Create requirements specification, estimate tasks and be able to present this to customers

Design and develop highly scalable, testable solutions for our customers either independently or with other developers

Evaluate, test, and ensure the quality of the solutions we deliver

Discover and fix programming bugs


 


Qualifications: 



3 years of experience as a developer/software engineer working mostly in C#, JavaScript, HTML and CSS, but you should also have experience with other languages ​​and technologies such as React, Flutter, Angular, JQuery and web services


Must 
be eligible for a Government of Canada security clearance

Experience as a tech lead / solution architect is an advantage, but not a requirement

Knowledge and interest in technical architecture for servers, databases, firewalls, infrastructure, etc. Azure experience nice to have

Knowledge of agile development methods

Higher education at university / college level in IT or other relevant subjects (can be replaced with relevant experience)


 


Personal characteristics: 



Solution-oriented and curious about technology and has a genuine interest in the subject

Willing to learn and open to getting acquainted with new issues

Ability to present and explain issues to both IT and non-technical system users

Structured, proactive, motivated, responsible and a team-player

Strong English oral and written skills. French is nice to have but not required

Position: Senior Systems Engineer



Area of Expertise: 
IT Cloud Integration and Advisory


Location: 
Based in Ottawa, ON, however, we are open to fully remote workers within Canada.


Start: 
As soon as possible


Salary Range:
 $90,000 to $110,000 + Benefits


Type:
 Full-time


COVID Vaccination:
 Required (subject to duty to accommodate)

 


The Opportunity


Working with IC 360 and its clients is an exciting, challenging and rewarding opportunity. If you want to grow your experience and deploy technology with purpose, this is the place to do it.

 

You will work as a staff consultant with many external clients on deploying the very best modern technology, with an awesome team of peers to help everyone get their best work done. We work hard, have fun and deliver critical solutions to our clients. We only work with clients that value technology and invest in doing things right. It means you get to deploy the very best solutions.

 

At IC 360, we see the way technology is changing and we are adapting to it. Work with us and you will be able to adapt your skillset to focus less on infrastructure as it continues to be simplified, and more on the strategic use of apps, data, automation and analytics.

 

The ever-changing world of technology is going through a dramatic shift and we want forward-looking members on our team along for the ride.

 

The ideal applicant should possess the abilities listed below:


Strong communications in English, both written and verbal

Excellent interpersonal skills

Innovative problem-solving

Analytical mindset

Desire to work as a consultant with various clients and projects

Desire to continuously learn and develop


 


The Role


As a Senior Systems Engineer, you will take a lead role in designing, configuring and deploying solutions using the latest technology available, such as the Microsoft Cloud solutions to solve business challenges and ensure continuity of projects. You will also collaborate with clients, advising them on using information technology to achieve their company goals or solve challenges.

 

Work on technology will go beyond infrastructure, and as the transition to the cloud stabilizes, we will increasingly focus on the strategic use of applications, automation, data management and reporting to deliver value from modern technology.

 


Responsibilities


The Employee is to generally provide consulting and other services in the areas of cloud technology architecture and implementation. Specifically, the Employee will:


Deliver assigned project work and support customer IT environments under IC 360 service agreements

Provide project leadership in the integration and consolidation of enterprise technology solutions and platforms

Assist in the configuration of IT Cloud technologies, specifically but not limited to Microsoft Office 365, Azure and AWS

Configure the underlying technologies required to enable cloud services such as: o Networking – Switching, Routing, Firewalls

Virtual infrastructure – VM Configuration and Storage Access and Control

Windows and Linux Servers

Develop technology standards within IC 360 to allow for the efficient implementation of technical platforms for clients

Provide clients with advice on technical architecture and assist in planning client technology solutions

Lead the development and implementation of application security management plans for applications accessed by the client and external personnel

Provide direction and guidance to project teams and suppliers who are designing, developing, enhancing and maintaining business-critical information systems and data warehouse projects

Provide direction, advice, and recommendations on specific aspects of the application enabling server and software infrastructure configurations and operational improvements

Provide advice and recommendations concerning financial aspects of asset and cost management

Provide technical advice in the process of selecting systems or applications hardware and software solutions

Write documentation for applications and platforms

Conduct research on technology solutions and new technologies when required

Work with third parties in support of client technology deployments

Assist in the development and writing of business cases and assessment reports through the provision of technical content

Assist in the preparation and presentation of tactical and strategic plans for the development and integration of technology systems

Conduct troubleshooting and analysis of technical systems to determine the root cause of outages and systems issues

Respond to front-line and escalated tickets from Managed Services clients

Act as a Technical Account Manager with large Managed Services clients where 3rd party contractors are providing front-line helpdesk services

Perform such other duties as may be required


 


Requirements



A post-secondary degree in Computer Science, Information Technology, or a related discipline 

Have a working knowledge of IT Infrastructure including networking, storage, servers, and industry-standard applications.

Expert in deploying and configuring Microsoft 365 and Azure

Expert in debugging hardware, software, and network problems

Practical knowledge of several operating systems and databases

Customer-focused approach


 


About Us


IC 360 Solutions is a company built to integrate the best technology on the market to small and medium-sized Canadian organizations. We work with many clients on various types of business technology challenges. Companies work with us because we bring a team of experts to focus on optimizing their use of technology to best solve business problems. Our focus is entirely on providing real results with technology.





COVID-19 Policy


Subject to human rights legislation, IC 360 requires the successful candidate to be fully vaccinated as a condition of employment and as a part of its legal obligation under the Occupational Health and Safety Act. Proof of vaccination will be required at a later date along with reasonable proof of the existence of a protected ground under human rights legislation, if applicable.




IC 360 Solutions is working remotely until the pandemic is over.

industries: IT Services and IT Consulting
description:
Poste Permanent



Développeur SQL






Responsabilités principales


 Travaille étroitement avec les équipes de la comptabilité d’investissements, de mesure de la performance, de la gestion des placements ainsi qu’avec la Directrice - Systèmes pour proposer, définir, développer, tester et mettre en place des solutions techniques efficaces.

 Conçoit et rédige des programmes et des rapports complexes et efficaces pour répondre aux besoins des utilisateurs.

 Travaille sur des sujets complexes où l’analyse de la situation ou des données nécessite une évaluation approfondie des facteurs variables, en ayant l’expérience pour exercer un bon jugement dans la sélection des méthodes, des techniques et des critères d’évaluation afin d’obtenir les meilleurs résultats.

 Participe à l’établissement des stratégies d’intégration d’entreprise et établit des lignes directrices et des normes pour la mise en place de ces stratégies.

 Maintient et soutient les systèmes existants en répondant aux demandes des utilisateurs et en apportant des modifications aux programmes ou aux données.

Coordonne avec les utilisateurs afin d’assurer l’efficacité et la ponctualité des livrables del’information et des systèmes.

Trouve et recommande des améliorations aux processus reliés au cycle de développement dessystèmes et des procédures.

Prépare la documentation relative aux systèmes, à la programmation et aux utilisateurs afin de veillerau maintien des normes, des procédures et des méthodologies dans le but d’assurer la qualité des logiciels.





Exigences professionnelles


Baccalauréat en sciences informatiques, en génie de logiciels ou en mathématiques

Minimum de trois (3) à cinq (5) ans d’expérience dans le développement d’applications avecMicrosoft SQL (procédure et fonctions de stockage) dans un environnement financier

Expérience en développement de rapports avec SQL Server Reporting Services

Bonne compréhension de Microsoft Visual Studio

Connaissance approfondie des systèmes de comptabilité d’investissements, des produits financiers,des transactions et de mesure de la performance

Connaissance professionnelle de la conception axée objet et la méthodologie d’analyse

Capacité à produire une analyse approfondie et à concevoir des spécifications

Capacité éprouvée à maîtriser de nouvelles technologies avec une approche organisée etsystématique pour la résolution de problèmes

Expérience de travail préalable en méthodologie Agile sera un atout

Bilinguisme (français et anglais)

Compétences et aptitudes souhaitées

Très bonnes compétences en matière de communication, tant à l’oral qu’à l’écrit

Bon esprit d’équipe

Orienté vers le client; capacité à travailler avec un groupe d’utilisateurs exigeants dans un environnement dynamique

Excellentes aptitudes analytiques

Sens poussé des responsabilités et motivation

Curiosité d’apprendre de nouvelles méthodes de travail pour trouver des solutions

Capacité à produire des résultats de qualité sous pression dans les délais prévus

Connaissance et expérience dans les systèmes suivants seraient considérées comme un 
Atout :


connaissance et expérience du système SimCorp

expérience dans le développement avec R, Python ou un langage similaire

expérience dans le développement d’applications de données avec VB.Net, C#.NET et VBA

connaissance de BizTalk, de Microsoft Office 365 et/ou de Team Foundation Server et de ses outils

Expérience des outils de visualisation front-end – Tableau ou PowerBI

1. 负责交易相关后台开发维护工作，参与后台系统设计开发

 

Responsible for the development and maintenance of the transaction-related backend

 

platform, and engage in the design and development of the backend system

 

2. 负责高并发、低延迟系统的设计、开发和性能调优

 

Responsible for the design, development and performance tuning of high concurrency and

 

low latency system.

 

3. 参与产品设计讨论并完成高质量的设计和编码

 

Participate and contribute in product design. Complete the design and coding with good

 

quality

Provide valid suggestions for systems optimization

 

职位要求

Job Requirements:

1. 熟练掌握Golang（java/c++开发者有意愿转go也可），熟悉Linux常用操作，对 shell

 

awk有一定了解；了解PHP、Python或Nodejs等至少一种脚本语言

 

Proﬁcient in Golang (Experience with java/c++ and willing to switch to Go is acceptable),

 

familiar with Linux operations, have basic understanding of SHELL, AWK

understand at

least one scripting language such as PHP, Python or Nodejs

 

2. 熟悉常用的中间件如MySQL、Redis、Kafka、etcd、ES等，熟悉Http、tcp、分布式

 

事务等

in Http, tcp, distributed transactions, and etc.

OpenAPI开发设计经验者优先

and strong team collaboration.

job_title: Développeur DevOps à l’aide de Kubernetes
industries: IT Services and IT Consulting, Software Development, and Financial Services
description:
Nous Offrons




L’occasion de travailler avec certains des meilleurs professionnels du secteur, au sein d’une société qui valorise l’intellect individuel tout comme le travail d’équipe

Des bureaux à la fine pointe de la technologie aménagés pour maximiser la collaboration

Des conditions de travail flexibles. 

Des défis enrichissants offrant la possibilité d’apprendre et de progresser constamment

Un environnement qui exploite tout le potentiel de la technologie




Profil De L’équipe



La division services technologiques de l’entreprise offre des services techniques partagés à l’ensemble de l’entreprise en vue de soutenir toutes les applications commerciales et les utilisateurs finaux. Elle est présente à toutes les étapes du cycle de développement des logiciels de l’entreprise afin d’assurer une programmation, des tests fonctionnels et d’intégration et des lancements d’application efficaces, en plus d’assurer un soutien et un suivi continu pour plus de 3 000 applications de production.

Elle s’occupe également de livrer toutes les technologies du milieu de travail (de bureau, mobiles, audio, vidéo, de productivité, intranet ou internet) dans une configuration intégrée permettant de maximiser la productivité des employés. Elle livre ses applications et offre ses services aux utilisateurs finaux par l’entremise d’une infrastructure évolutive, sécuritaire et fiable composée de services informatiques et infonuagiques, de centres et de bases de données, et de réseaux et de stockage parfaitement intégrés.



Description Du Poste



Morgan Stanley est à la recherche d’un candidat expérimenté pour se joindre à son groupe d’ingénierie de calculs et de stockage. Cette personne sera responsable de simplifier la complexité du déploiement et de l’installation intégrés des applications en développant et en recommandant des modèles de déploiement certifiés OCI pour une orchestration cohérente de microservices, notamment la capacité à tolérer avec grâce les pannes et les reprises des applications.

Au sein de l’équipe des activités informatiques et technologiques de Morgan Stanley, le groupe d’ingénierie de calculs et de stockage est l’un des principaux groupes d’ingénierie des infrastructures. Il est responsable de divers aspects essentiels de la technologie et de l’ingénierie tels que l’ingénierie Agile, la distribution de logiciels, l’ingénierie des plateformes (IaaS et PaaS), l’ingénierie de conteneurs Linux et DDI et l’intégration des clients.

La personne retenue aura une forte visibilité aux échelons les plus élevés et travaillera en étroite collaboration avec la direction de la société et l’ensemble de la communauté externe.



Expérience Pratique Essentielle




Expérience pertinente avec Docker et les normes OCI (Open Container Initiative) ainsi que forte préférence pour l’ingénierie Kubernetes/OCI

Expérience pertinente en utilisation des techniques d’écosystème Docker/Kubernetes (déploiements OCI comprenant l’authentification transparente, la découverte de services, le mouvement des données, l’équilibrage des charges, la gestion et l’hébergement du trafic, les calculs sans serveurs et les services maillés)

Connaissances approfondies et vaste expérience dans le domaine du déploiement d’applications à l’aide de Kubernetes et forte préférence pour OpenShift pour les nuages tant publics que privés

Expérience en création d’applications natives infonuagiques

Connaissance des pratiques DevOps et Agile

Excellentes aptitudes de communication




Compétences, Qualifications Et Expérience Pertinente




Bonne connaissance de l’intégration et de la livraison continues modernes (CI/CD) et des concepts « source to image »

Bonne connaissance de l’architecture de microservices et des normes du secteur concernant les nuages privés et publics

Bonne connaissance des principes des « 12 facteurs » et de leur mise en œuvre dans la conception des applications

Bonne compréhension des techniques de configuration d’applications comme les pratiques de configuration actuelles, Spring Boot/Cloud, etc.

Expérience pratique en utilisation des modèles de déploiement d’applications infonuagiques comme Blue-Green et Canary ou dans un contexte plus vaste de services maillés, avec Helm, K8 Operators, etc.

Expérience pratique en utilisation de modèles de mise à l’échelle des applications infonuagiques

Bonne compréhension du partage d’état entre les composants infonuagiques extensibles (Kafka, mise en cache dynamique distribuée, Redis, Mongo)

Bonne connaissance des différents moteurs de base de données (p. ex., DB2) et de la gestion et du stockage des états à l’aide de Kubernetes

Bonne connaissance des modèles de conception Kubernetes, y compris des piles d’observabilité et de télémétrie

Compréhension des techniques de SRE, y compris stabilité et modèles d’ingénierie du chaos




À Propos De Nous



Morgan Stanley, chef de file mondial en services financiers, offre un large éventail de services bancaires d’investissement, d’opérations sur titres, de gestion de placements et de gestion de patrimoine. Chez Morgan Stanley Montréal, nous façonnons l’avenir de notre société mondiale et contribuons à notre communauté locale. Notre équipe œuvre dans de nombreux domaines.

Morgan Stanley est un employeur offrant l’égalité professionnelle. Nous travaillons pour offrir un environnement de travail accueillant et favorable dans lequel toutes les personnes peuvent réaliser leur plein potentiel. Notre main-d’œuvre est composée de personnes talentueuses et créatives qui représentent les collectivités dans lesquelles nous exerçons nos activités à travers le monde et qui présentent des compétences, des perspectives, des expériences et un bagage diversifié. Notre profond engagement à bâtir une culture d’inclusion se manifeste par les efforts constants que nous déployons à embaucher du personnel et à assurer son perfectionnement et son avancement en fonction de son talent et de ses compétences.

Dans ce document, l’emploi du masculin n’a d’autres fins que celle d’alléger le texte. Toutes personnes intéressées par ce poste sont invitées à soumettre leur candidature.


Tous nos postes sont situés à Montréal, Québec.


La connaissance du français et de l’anglais est requise.

Le centre de technologie de Montréal en vedette : https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=QBZ3q5epTIM


Vidéo datant d’octobre 2019


Bâtissez une carrière qui se démarque. Pour plus d’information, visitez le morganstanley.com.

8 mars 2022

job_title: Software Engineer in Test (SDET), Algorithms - Remote
industries: IT Services and IT Consulting, Software Development, and Internet Publishing
description:
At Kinaxis, who we are is grounded in our common belief that people matter. Each one of us plays an important part in accomplishing our work, building our culture and making a global impact.

Every day, we’re empowered to work together to help our customers make fast, confident planning decisions. This is how we create a better planet – for each other, for our customers and for generations to come. Our cloud-based platform RapidResponse ensures that the products we need – everything from medicine and cars, to day-to-day items like toothpaste – make it to market and into our hands when we need them with minimal ecological footprint.

We make the world better, and you can too.


Software Engineer in Test (SDET), Algorithms




About The Team 



The Business Algorithms team at Kinaxis creates customized solutions to optimize supply chains. Ever wonder how the hundreds of parts in your new smart phone come together from different suppliers all over the world? Kinaxis solves problems like that every day.

Our customers have terabytes of data that needs to be analyzed for the largest supply chains imaginable. Our algorithms move the global economy-- in seconds, not hours, or days.

It’s Big Data with an impact; Data Science on the front lines.

The Algorithms team works in a dynamic environment where real life supply chain challenges are being translated into complex algorithms that are coded, tested and released to world-wide known manufactures. Developers and Test engineers are working together to achieve high quality supply chain solutions, develop Next Generation frameworks to address testing complexity, and interact with Product Managers and customers on a daily basis.

We believe in the DevOps culture – we serve our own tools, frameworks, infrastructure. Automation is certainly at the top of our priority list.


 Who you are 



You thrive on delivering a quality product to customers and care deeply about testing best practices and efficient test strategies.

You enjoy complex logic/algorithms, working with Big Data.

You are driven by customer success, love to participate in customer-facing projects.

You prefer a fast-paced agile work environment and take pride in finding product defects.

You approach testing with creative ideas and innovative techniques.

You collaborate with Software Developers and Product Managers, and your passion is to identify and solve product gaps.

You’re a strong believer in Continuous Integration, and the DevOps mindset

You communicate fluidly, at the level of your audience, and seek to understand and be understood.

You like working in teams, mentoring, and sharing neat things you come across. 



 What you will do 




Technical




Drive development/testing processes by introducing Next Generation frameworks

Enhance existing automation tools and test infrastructure

Design, develop, and support automated tests

Architect, implement and improve state of the art tools for Continuous Delivery.




Customer Facing




Learn Supply Chain business challenges and contribute to testing relevant Use Cases / Business Processes.

Participate in requirements elaboration and review product specifications.

Translate requirements into Test Strategies and Test Cases

Interact with Rapid Response customers directly and indirectly through Product Managers.




Process Oriented




Improve processes and efficiency of the team, always look for opportunities to strengthen the team.

Share your knowledge and mentor less experienced team members.




Team Player




 Be part of the amazing, collaborative, and supportive Business Algorithms Team that is practicing true Agile where QAs and developers share the same objectives. 



 What we are looking for  




Required




7+ years of experience in software test development and automation functions.

A degree in engineering and/or applied science.

Solid programming and scripting languages experience (Python, C#, .Net). 

Exceptionally strong analytical skills and experience working with complex data

Proficiency in requirements elaboration and test plans creation.

Ability to search for and structure information regarding complex processes / functionality.

The ability to ‘think outside of the box’ is crucial in this fast-paced environment 

Strong teamwork and interpersonal skills

Adaptable and flexible to changing priorities

Self-starter with strong initiative and results orientation




Definite Assets




Exposure to manufacturing/fulfillment/BI/Workforce Management/financial business requirements/practices. 

Knowledge of C++/Java

Familiarity with Jenkins CI/CD and release pipelines.

Knowledge and experience in relational database design and usage.

Experience working in agile development environment.



What we have to offer



Challenging Work - We love solving highly complex problems. And as the global leaders in our industry, we never stop innovating—our work is never “done. That’s because across our teams and in all roles, every employee is empowered to bring their best ideas forward and to jump in and solve the problems they’re passionate about.

Great People - We take our work seriously, but we don’t take ourselves too seriously! It’s in our DNA to celebrate, laugh, and have fun. We are stronger, together, when we are open, honest, and above all, real. Every person is valued here and plays an important role in our shared success.

Global Impact - As a global team spanning continents, boundaries, and cultures, every day we are inspired by the impact our work has on our colleagues, our customers, our communities, and the world at large.

 Diversity, Equity and Inclusion - Diversity, equity and inclusion are more than words to us. They are the guiding principles for building a culture where we celebrate each others’ differences, continuously strive for equality and recognize that inclusion makes us stronger as individuals, a company and a global citizen. 


For more information, visit the Kinaxis web site at www.kinaxis.com or the company’s blog at http://blog.kinaxis.com/ .

Kinaxis strongly encourages diverse candidates to apply to our welcoming community. We strive to make our website and application process accessible to any and all users. If you would like to contact us regarding the accessibility of our website or need assistance completing the application process, please contact Human Resources at accommodations@kinaxis.com . This contact information is for accessibility requests only and cannot be used to inquire about the status of applications.

description:

industries: Capital Markets and Financial Services
description:
Samiti Technology is hiring a 
Senior Business Analyst 
for a contract-to-hire position with
 
our 
direct financial client. 





Please review the job description given below.






Work Experience: 




Functional / Technical Competencies:



Experienced Business analyst with extensive experience working within financial institutions primarily within the Fixed Income space ION Suite of applications. Strong understanding of FI markets across cash, futures, and swaps including in-depth understanding of the various workflows; pricing, quoting, RFQ negotiation, STP, settlement, and regulatory reporting.

This well-rounded individual will be required to analyze, define, document, and translate high-level business requirements into detailed function specifications for the Trade Surveillance Services.

They will need to work and liaise closely with the Securities technology team to understand and capture requirements, communicate those requirements to the development and change management teams, and when necessary assist Development and QA in resolving any gaps in the requirements







Skills:




10 + years’ Business Analyst experience within the Financial Industry and 5 + years of project experience supporting Front Office applications ideally within Fixed income space

Lead effort to assist stakeholders with expert advice and problem solving within the trading platform.

Define client requirements and specifications to completely map them into existing software functionalities or new client-specific developments

Conduct quality assurance for tasks and deliverables across all project life cycle handed over on time

Support the development and execution of the project, Work closely with various partners to resolve issues, streamline processes and implement solutions

Act as a liaison for the trading desk with other internal teams (including Operations, Compliance, Client Onboarding, and Legal) and external vendor platforms.

Maintain functional documentation of trading systems and vendor platforms for handling production support issues, facilitating onboarding, and implementing enhancement projects.

Functional requirements gathering and act as a business analyst in conjunction with Asset Class representatives and associated IT/Operations teams

Project plans, Scoping documents, Documenting Requirements, Test plans, User training & System Documentation.







Education / Qualifications: 




Bachelor’s degree/University degree in Computer Science or equivalent experience

Nous sommes à la recherche d’un développeur full-stack passionné et créatif pour venir rejoindre notre équipe. La personne aura un rôle clé dans nos équipes de développement tant au niveau Back-End que Front-End afin de mener notre application à un niveau supérieur!




Notre application est composée d’un mélange de sites web, d’API REST et de modules (add-ins) qui s’intègrent directement dans les logiciels de modélisation destinés au BIM. 




Si tu aimes participer activement, proposer des solutions et rester à l’affût des dernières technologies. C’est LE poste pour toi! 





À propos de nous


En quelques mots, chez BIM One nous sommes une équipe de passionnés qui commercialisent BIM Track, une plateforme de collaboration vitale pour le secteur de la construction, et qui permet à nos clients de travailler plus efficacement. Nous nous définissons comme des alliés pour nos clients, car notre produit est là pour les aider à mieux travailler tout en éliminant les maux de tête dans le processus.




Nous avons lancé le produit en 2016, et nous connaissons une croissance soutenue depuis ce temps. Le logo BIM Track a trouvé sa place sur tous les continents et est utilisé par des entreprises de conception, des entrepreneurs généraux et des gestionnaires de construction dans le monde entier. Nous recrutons des personnes intelligentes et compétentes, mais aussi très terre à terre.

Nous sommes fiers de ce que nous mettons sur le marché et aussi de la manière dont nous le faisons ! Nous ne nous contentons pas de fabriquer d'excellents produits, nous les fabriquons avec passion pour des personnes exceptionnelles, et nous le faisons avec humilité, en laissant notre ego à la porte.




Si nous avons éveillé ton intérêt, jette un coup d'œil à la description du poste ci-dessous. Si tu penses que nous pouvons faire de grandes choses ensemble, n'hésite pas un instant et envoie-nous ta candidature dès aujourd'hui!





Tes responsabilités seront:



Développer de nouvelles fonctionnalités pour répondre aux besoins de nos clients et du marché

Proposer des solutions pour régler les problèmes rencontrés

Partager ses connaissances avec le reste de l'équipe

Respecter les derniers standards de qualité en matière de développement logiciel

Participer à l'amélioration de nos processus internes

Participer aux différentes rencontres de planifications

Participer à la revue de code de tes pairs

Assurer la qualité du code livré grâce à des tests unitaires






Tu auras besoin de:



Baccalauréat en informatique ou génie logiciel ou DEC en informatique

Posséder une expérience de 3 années en conception de logiciel

Les connaissances techniques suivantes seront considérées comme un atout très important : Typescript, Node.js, AWS infrastructure

Connaissance des technos web (REACT, Typescript);

Capacité de bien organiser son travail dans une équipe multidisciplinaire.






Pourquoi rejoindre notre équipe:



Formation continue

Horaires flexibles

Environnement de travail style start-up

Mode de travail hybride - maison & bureau (Lévis ou Montréal)

Entreprise “techno”

Assurance collective

Compte soins de santé

Ligne confidentielle de soutien aux employés

Accès à la télémédecine

Jours de congés maladie

Participation de l'employeur au régime de retraite

TRAVAILLER AVEC DES COLLÈGUES INCROYABLES !






Tu te demandes ce qu’est BIM Track?


Excellente question! Voici une petite histoire pour t’aider à mieux comprendre. Une personne est chargée de mener à bien un projet de construction énorme et complexe. Les plans du bâtiment se trouvent dans une maquette 3D (BIM) qui recouvre toutes les différentes parties du projet, comme les systèmes électriques, mécaniques, de plomberie, la maçonnerie, etc., etc. Le problème est que tous les participants à un projet de construction BIM ne sont pas des experts en BIM. Les logiciels de modélisation sont complexes. Sans un produit comme BIM Track, nos clients potentiels sont constamment en train d'extraire des piles de courriels, de feuilles de calcul et de notes de réunion, en se posant des questions telles que : Qui va résoudre le problème de conception? Quelle est l'importance de ce problème ? De quoi avons-nous convenu ? C'est là que notre produit vient sauver la situation... En résumé, BIM Track permet une meilleure coordination et une meilleure coordination permet de meilleurs bâtiments. 




Nous sommes impatients d'avoir de tes nouvelles et d'apprendre à te connaître !

industries: IT Services and IT Consulting, Wireless Services, and Telecommunications
description:
Req Id: 344600

At Bell, we do more than build world-class networks, develop innovative services and create original multiplatform media content – we advance how Canadians connect with each other and the world.

If you’re ready to bring game-changing ideas to life and join a community that values, professional growth and employee wellness, we want you on the Bell team.

The Bell IT team uses emerging technologies, Agile and DevOps to design and build innovative solutions that enable Bell’s communications services for businesses and consumers. We’re looking for creative problem-solvers who are curious, collaborative and ready to be on the leading edge of technological transformation.

The Bell Mobility team offers a full range of wireless products and services for residential and business customers, including the largest selection of superphones on the fastest and most advanced network technology, under the Bell Mobility and Virgin Mobile brands.

The Bell Mobility Wireless, IT team is looking for a talented Business Analysts to lead the delivery of IT solutions on behalf of the Bell Mobility business that drive growth with innovative services. The successful candidate will work for and alongside a Project Manager, and will partner with other IT teams such as Planning, Architecture, Infrastructure, etc. as well as external vendors such as CGI, Amdocs and IBM.

We require highly motivated individuals, who thrive in a constantly changing and exciting environment, to apply creativity and innovation in the development of solutions essential to support Bell Mobility's current & future success.



Job Duties / Accountabilities



The Business Analyst is responsible for gathering and documenting the business requirements and then ensuring that the deliverables produced by the development teams conform to the business requirements. 

Beyond the facilitation of the up-front business requirements and system requirements gathering sessions and resulting documentation, the role also involves driving the user acceptance testing process, including preparation of acceptance criteria, review of the test plans and scenarios, review of test results as well as taking responsibility for end-to-end testing. In some cases, the Business Analyst also executes test cases and directly ensures system integrity. 

The Business Analyst is also involved in documenting non-functional requirements, including (and not limited to) interface specifications, integration requirements, security requirements, as well as contributing to the project planning and administration. 

Act as liaison for cross-functional team, including vendor and business partners.

Partner with Enterprise Architects and technical primes to work on projects’ conceptual/architectural solutions.

Partner with the Project Manager in delivering highly successful projects, joint activities include (and not limited to):


Organize customer and internal team meetings to identify and validate business and system requirements.

Lead vendor partners (such as AMDOCS and CGI) through the application development project phase.

Ability to identify and quantify risks relevant to business and systems requirements, delivery timelines/quality, budget constraints, etc

Coordinate and communicate various aspects of projects; including producing status reports, meeting minutes, issue logs, and informing cross-functional teams of decisions and progress.

Schedule and mediate team meetings, follow up on issues, obtain sign-off from project stakeholders on completion of documented deliverables.





Essential Skills / Competencies




5+ years experience in the telecommunications field and Proven IT experience 

Bachelor or Masters degree in an area such as IT, Information Systems, Computer Science, Engineering, Telecommunications 

Significant experience leading multi-disciplinary Joint Application Development (JAD) sessions. 

Strong Leadership and significant experience dealing with multiple vendors in the creation of end-to-end solutions.

Excellent verbal and written communication, negotiation and conflict resolution skills. 

Absolute ability to see the business problem and business solution in the eyes of the customer and strong problem-solving skills

Computer proficiency with Microsoft Office tools (Word, Excel, PowerPoint, Project, Visio) 




Essential Technical Skills




Strong experience with mediation, billing, charging applications is key (Network Mediation and Usage Processing Systems)

Experience with Wireless Technologies including (4G, 5G Networks) is a great asset 

Extensive experience as a Senior Programmer/Designer or Systems Analyst.

Related delivery experience leveraging Scaled Agile Framework for enterprise (SAFe)

Strong analytical thinker with ability to associate technical tasks as well as relate to pertinent business processes 

Deep knowledge of multi-tiered application development, infrastructure and networking concepts and practices. 




Preferred Skills And Your Intangibles




Knowledge of Internet of Things and Machine-to-Machine Technologies would be an asset.

Familiarity with Wireless ordering and supply chain applications/tools/processes 

Security management for software and applications 

Demonstrate flexibility and ability to adapt to change in a fast-paced work environment and to manage ambiguity, uncertainty and changing priorities

You love to innovate and embrace the change that comes with it


Bilingualism is an asset (English and French); adequate knowledge of French is required for positions in Quebec.



Additional Information




Position Type:
 Management


Job Status:
 Regular - Full Time


Job Location:
 Canada : Ontario : Mississauga || Canada : Ontario : Toronto


Application Deadline:
 03/18/2022



Please apply directly online to be considered for this role. Applications through email will not be accepted.



At Bell, we don’t just accept difference - we celebrate it. We’re committed to fostering an inclusive, equitable, and accessible workplace where every team member feels valued, respected, and supported, and has the opportunity to reach their full potential. We welcome and encourage applications from people with disabilities.

Accommodations are available on request for candidates taking part in all aspects of the selection process. For a confidential inquiry, simply email your recruiter directly or recruitment@bell.ca to make arrangements. If you have questions regarding accessible employment at Bell please email our Diversity & Inclusion Team at inclusion@bell.ca.
